settings.title: Rapid Curing
settings.text: Benefit from the rapid curing properties of HQC Water Sealer, ensuring quick and efficient protection against penetrating damp for your exterior brick surfaces.

settings.title: Protection Against Penetrating Damp
settings.text: Protect your buildings, both old and new, from the damaging effects of penetrating damp with HQC Water Sealer, providing a reliable barrier against moisture infiltration.

settings.heaing: Suitable for Old and New Buildings
settings.title: Suitable for Old and New Buildings
settings.text: HQC Water Sealer is suitable for use on various types of buildings, offering versatile protection against penetrating damp regardless of age or construction.

settings.title: Maintains Cleanliness of Limestone
settings.text: Keep your limestone surfaces clean and free from stains with HQC Water Sealer, preserving their aesthetic appeal and reducing maintenance requirements.

settings.title: Non-Blocking Pores
settings.text: Choose HQC Water Sealer for its non-blocking pore formulation, allowing water vapor to escape while effectively repelling liquid water from the surface.

settings.title: Easy Application
settings.text: Enjoy the ease of application with HQC Water Sealer, which can be applied easily by brush or spray, ensuring a hassle-free process for protecting your exterior brick surfaces.

settings.title: Deep Penetration (2 - 10 mm)
settings.text: Benefit from the deep penetration capabilities of HQC Water Sealer, as it infiltrates the surface up to 10 mm, providing thorough protection against moisture infiltration.

settings.title: High Coverage Area
settings.text: Achieve high coverage area with HQC Water Sealer, with one litre covering 2-4mÂ², ensuring cost-effective protection for your exterior brick surfaces.

settings.title: Versatile Application Methods
settings.text: Opt for HQC Water Sealer for its versatile application methods, allowing for application by brush, lambswool roller, or coarse spray, catering to various surface areas and conditions.

settings.heading: Absorption Inhibitor
settings.text: Our water sealer is infused with a specialized absorption inhibitor, which deeply permeates the surface, ensuring comprehensive internal protection. This inhibitor works at a microscopic level, preventing water and moisture from penetrating the material, thereby safeguarding it against potential water damage.

settings.heading: Hydrophobic Barrier Formula
settings.text: At the heart of our water sealer is a hydrophobic barrier formula, meticulously developed to repel water effectively. This formula creates a surface layer that repels rain, spills, and moisture, helping to maintain the integrity and appearance of the sealed material, whether it's wood, concrete, or masonry.

settings.heading: Durability Enhancer
settings.text: We enhance our sealer with robust durability enhancers, ensuring that the protective qualities of the sealer endure through various weather conditions and wear. These enhancers fortify the sealed surface against environmental factors, UV rays, and daily use, extending the life and appearance of your surfaces.

settings.text: Pay for the product, not the added branded value, all of our products are made at the highest quality offered at the lowest price with no branded valueExperience high-grade formulation without inflated prices

settings.title: Rapid Curing
settings.text: Quick protection against penetrating damp, rapidly curing to safeguard surfaces soon after application.

settings.title: Versatile Application
settings.text: Suitable for a wide range of buildings, both old and new, effectively protecting against damp and maintaining cleanliness of limestone and other materials.

settings.title: Breathable Protection
settings.text: Allows water vapor to escape while repelling water, ensuring moisture inside the structure can evaporate without letting external moisture in.

settings.title: Easy Application
settings.text: Can be easily applied using a brush or spray, offering convenience and efficiency in application.

settings.title: Deep Penetration
settings.text: Capable of penetrating 2 - 10 mm into substrates like limestone, providing thorough and long-lasting protection against dampness.

settings.title: Cost-Effective Coverage
settings.text: Economical usage with one litre covering 2-4mÂ², making it a cost-effective option for large-scale applications.

settings.title: Flexible Application Methods
settings.text: Offers flexibility in application methods, including the use of a brush, lambswool roller, or coarse spray to suit different surface textures and preferences.

settings.title: Optimal Multiple Coat Application
settings.text: Achieves the best results when multiple coats are applied wet on wet, ensuring comprehensive coverage and protection against damp.

settings.heading: PREP
settings.text: Prep your area and walls by sanding, cleaning, and ensuring the surface is smooth & dry - use primer (or mist coat) on bare surfaces or fresh plaster board

settings.heading: PAINT
settings.text: Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray

HQC Paint's Unmatched Versatility

settings.heading: Environmental Impact
settings.text: HQC Paint takes a stand for the planet with formulations that encourage less frequent application, reducing environmental strain and promoting sustainable living.

settings.heading: Cutting-Edge Technology
settings.text: Paint integrates only high-grade ingredients and advanced resin technology to offer a finish that is not only long-lasting but also vibrant and full of life.

settings.heading: Cost Efficiency
settings.text: Designed to reduce the need for multiple coats, HQC Paint is a cost-effective option that doesn't compromise on quality, providing substantial savings over time.
The HQC Paint Difference

settings.heading: No more multiple products
settings.text: HQC Paint revolutionises painting with its simplicity. One paint does it all, reducing the need for multiple products and streamlining the decorating process.

settings.heading: Diamond durability
settings.text: With diamond durability and superior coverage, The versatility of HQC Paint allows it to be used on a variety of surfaces, from interior & exterior walls to garden fences, without compromising on performance.

settings.heading: Low Price & High Quality
settings.text: HQC Paint delivers in-house quality without the retail markup, making professional-grade results accessible and affordable for everyone.
HQC Paint's Commitment to Quality

settings.heading: Industry-Leading Ingredients
settings.text: HQC paints are formulated with water-based solutions, making them environmentally friendly and safe for use in any setting. Say goodbye to harmful chemicals and toxins, and embrace a greener, more sustainable approach to decorating.

settings.heading: Scrub and Clean with Ease
settings.text: Experience minimal odour levels with HQC paints, ensuring a pleasant painting experience without the discomfort of strong fumes. Perfect for indoor applications where air quality is a concern.

settings.heading: Trusted by Professionals
settings.text: With water-based formulations, cleanup is a breeze. Simply use soap and water to clean your tools and surfaces, reducing waste and environmental impact.
